original_text: But he was rebuked for his wrongdoing by a donkey—an animal without speech—who spoke with a human voice and restrained the prophet’s madness.
korean_text: 자기의 불법으로 말미암아 책망을 받되 말하지 못하는 나귀가 사람의 소리로 말하여 이 선지자의 미친 행동을 저지하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But he was rebuked for his wrongdoing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그의 잘못으로 인해 책망을 받았고

sentences.original_text: who spoke with a human voice
